contextId.information: Jesus died as a sacrifice so that God would forgive people's sins. AT: "like the lambs without blemish or spot that the Jewish priests sacrificed" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: like a lamb without blemish or spot

contextId.information: Peter speaks about his readers before they believed in Christ as if they had been similar to lost sheep wandering around aimlessly. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: you had been wandering away like lost sheep
